title: could not compile `wasmer-compiler-cranelift`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust cargo run --release ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.60.0-nightly (89b9f7b28 2022-01-10) binary: rustc commit-hash: 89b9f7b284aacc5f8613438b80e4dd7bdd10549e commit-date: 2022-01-10 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.60.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling wasmer-compiler-cranelift v2.1.1 Compiling wasmer v2.1.1 error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_monomorphize/src/collector.rs:966:9: no MIR available for DefId(20:9953 ~ cranelift_codegen[5733]::machinst::buffer::{impl#3}::get_srclocs_sorted) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1169:9 ```
Backtrace

``` 0: std::panicking::begin_panic:: 1: std::panic::panic_any:: 2: ::bug 3: ::bug 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt::::{closure#0}, ()> 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt:: 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::bug_fmt 7: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_neighbours 8: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 9: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 10: 49: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::>, &[rustc_middle::mir::mono::CodegenUnit])>> 50: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 51: ::collect_and_partition_mono_items 52: rustc_codegen_ssa::back::symbol_export::exported_symbols_provider_local 53: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::> 54: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 55: ::encode_crate_root 56: rustc_metadata::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata_impl 57: rustc_data_structures::sync::join:: 58: rustc_metadata::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata 59: ::ongoing_codegen 60: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> 61: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 62: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}> 63: >::set::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.60.0-nightly (89b9f7b28 2022-01-10) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [collect_and_partition_mono_items] collect_and_partition_mono_items #1 [exported_symbols] exported_symbols end of query stack error: could not compile `wasmer-compiler-cranelift` warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error: build failed ```
